name: Yellow Plant
desc: A tiny yellow plant with bright red veins and thorns.
trap_desc: You notice blood on your hand after placing the plant in your bag.  You realize you must have pricked your finger on one of the plant's thorns.  You begin to feel faint and you fall to the floor.  You watch as your hand, then arm begins to turn purple and black.  Poison!  In a matter of seconds, the poison has spread to your heart and you are dead.
